short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that closes any lingering Zoom tabs that are left open after the Zoom meetings are opened. No analytics. No ads. Free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
After 5 seconds, these Zoom tabs will auto-close by themselves thanks to this add-on. (it is configurable to 10, 15, 30 seconds and more).

Zoom, Bluejeans, Microsoft Team, Amazon Chime, and any other launcher application's URLs can be added in this extension to auto-close the lingering tabs.

It is safe and secure. No data leaves your computer via this extension. 
* No analytics. 
* No ads. 
* Completely free. 

This extension doesn't send any info away from your computer to other servers.
